Header.title: Butterfly Consultancy
Header.paragraph: We believe in being Innovative, Passionate, Modern and Client Centric

About.paragraph: We are a boutique consulting company based in ACT delivering solutions in the field of Project Management, Information Technology, Construction and Entertainment. Our consultants have extensive and varied experience in markets of India and Australia. We have special research interest in the field of health information focusing on electronic health records.
